org.jasig.cas.support.wsfederation

Class WsFederationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.wsfederation.WsFederationHelper

  • @Component(value="wsFederationHelper")
public final class WsFederationHelper
extends Object
    Helper class that does the heavy lifting with the openSaml library.
    Since:
    4.2.0
    Author:
    John Gasper

    • Method Detail

      • createCredentialFromToken

        public WsFederationCredential createCredentialFromToken(org.opensaml.saml.saml1.core.Assertion assertion)
        createCredentialFromToken converts a SAML 1.1 assertion to a WSFederationCredential.
        Parameters:
        assertion - the provided assertion
        Returns:
        an equivalent credential.

      • parseTokenFromString

        public org.opensaml.saml.saml1.core.Assertion parseTokenFromString(String wresult)
        parseTokenFromString converts a raw wresult and extracts it into an assertion.
        Parameters:
        wresult - the raw token returned by the IdP
        Returns:
        an assertion

      • validateSignature

        public boolean validateSignature(org.opensaml.saml.saml1.core.Assertion assertion,
                        WsFederationConfiguration wsFederationConfiguration)
        validateSignature checks to see if the signature on an assertion is valid.
        Parameters:
        assertion - a provided assertion
        wsFederationConfiguration - WS-Fed configuration provided.
        Returns:
        true if the assertion's signature is valid, otherwise false
